title: Talking Derby and Dallas Mavericks CEO, Cynt Marshall
itunes:title: Talking Derby and Dallas Mavericks CEO, Cynt Marshall
description:
Join Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch as they discuss the Kentucky Derby with Churchill Downs' CEO, Bill Carstanjen, then stick around for a chat with Dallas Mavericks' CEO, Cynt Marshall, as they talk about the playoffs, working with Mark Cuban and franchise star, Luka Doncic. All that and more on Business of Sports. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
